author: Doctor_Sinister
title: First LEGO set I remember.
review:
I've still got some pieces from this, but it's not been built in over thirty years - kind of sad, but I wouldn't be the AFOL I am without this set.  The only downside was the stickers which didn't last long, but the design itself was very cool given the relatively limited type of pieces back then.

Dr. S.

author: starwarsgeek101_
title: WoW!!
review: What a set! I remember getting this over thirty years ago! An outstanding set that can work out for play or display, but mostly for play. It is great to have this set for many years! The only thing that can be a problem is that the stickers keep on falling off, even with glue. But do try to grab this set sometime because it is good for beginners and collectors!
